type: Superalgos Review - A Great First Step

definition.text: The onboarding of the superalgos tutorial was a fun way to get started with the system. The guides were well written and the ability to stop and resume the tutorials is very useful. I encountered no errors in the system while using it and only one small UI hangup. Overall it was a great introduction to the system.

paragraphs.text: Right click and Edit to enter edit mode and change this text. ENTER to write new paragraphs. ESC to exit edit mode. Then you can use docs.save to save your changes and app.contribute to send it to the main repository.
